TopicTitle: How do I rescue this guy?

Articles.Content:
So I accepted a contract to rescue a random EVA guy. I have arrived at his position but cannot take control of him to make him board my empty pod piloted by a probe. What do I do?

http://i.imgur.com/c1iqkIY.jpg' alt='c1iqkIY.jpg'>

Thanks for the help.

Edited September 18, 2014 by Lucy1nTheSky
[ and ] keys when close to switch control.
Contract completed. Thank you so much, I figured it was something simple like that. I kept pressing Tab instead xD.
